mapper.select: select TBL_REPLY.REPLYNUM, TBL_REPLY.USERID, TBL_REPLY.NUM, TBL_REPLY.REPLYCOMMENT, TBL_USER.USERNICKNAME from TBL_REPLY, TBL_USER WHERE NUM = #{num} AND TBL_REPLY.USERID = TBL_USER.USERID
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_REPLY ( USERID, NUM, REPLYCOMMENT) values( #{userId}, #{num},#{replyComment})
mapper.delete: delete from TBL_Reply where NUM = #{num} and REPLYNUM=#{replyNum}
